mapper.select: SELECT id,node_code,use_water_unit_id,unit_code,contacts,mobile_number,phone_number, CASE main WHEN '1' THEN '主联系人' WHEN '0' THEN '备用联系人' END AS main, open_id,deleted,locked,wrong_times FROM t_w_use_water_unit_contacts WHERE deleted = '0' AND use_water_unit_id = #{useWaterUnitId} ORDER BY main DESC
SELECT mobile_number,contacts FROM t_w_use_water_unit_contacts WHERE unit_code = #{unitCode} AND main ='1' AND deleted = '0'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_w_use_water_unit_contacts WHERE deleted = '0' AND main = '1' AND use_water_unit_id = #{orgId}

SELECT top 1 id, node_code, unit_code, unit_name, unit_address, department FROM t_w_use_water_unit t1 inner JOIN ( SELECT use_water_unit_id FROM t_w_use_water_unit_contacts t2 WHERE mobile_number = #{mobileNumber} AND deleted = '0' ) t2 ON t1.id = t2.use_water_unit_id
SELECT contacts FROM t_w_use_water_unit_contacts WHERE deleted = '0' AND use_water_unit_id = #{id} AND mobile_number != #{mobileNumber}
